block.p: SCHNEIDER - Philip. Great Neck. Beloved husband of Sandra. Father of Gail, Aaron, Perry, Charlotte, Yola. Grandfather of Shira, Gary, Elana, Avi, David, Lauren, Heather and four great grandchildren. U. of Wisconsin graduate, U.S. Army Purple Heart, ZOA lifetime member. Sinai Chapels, 16205 Horace Harding Expressway, Queens, Thursday 12:15.
